Name: polycystic echinococcosis
Definition: An echinococcosis that is caused by the larvae of Echinococcus vogeli or Echinococcus oligarthrus

Name: obsolete Hepeviridae infectious disease
Definition: A (+)ssRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans

Name: obsolete Coxiella burnetii pneumonia
Definition: A Q fever that is a zoonotic infectious disease caused by Coxiella burnetii

Name: obsolete Coxiella burnetii hepatitis
Definition: A Q fever that involves inflammation of the liver caused by Coxiella burnetti

Name: hepatitis
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that is characterized by bleeding symptoms due to low levels of circulating prothrombin

Name: hepatic vascular disease
Definition: A vascular disease that is located_in the liver.

Name: liver cancer
Definition: A hepatobiliary system cancer that is located_in the liver.
Synonym: resectable malignant neoplasm of the liver

Name: hepatic tuberculosis
Definition: A gastrointestinal tuberculosis that involves infection located_in liver

Name: liver cirrhosis
Definition: A cell type benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in glial-type cells.

Name: hepatopulmonary syndrome
Definition: A bone deterioration disease that has_material_basis_in gradual dehydration and tears located_in intervertebral disc.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's lymphoma
Definition: A bone deterioration disease that has_material_basis_in gradual dehydration and tears located_in intervertebral disc.

Name: liver benign neoplasm
Definition: A commensal bacterial infectious disease that results in infection
Synonym: epithelial hepatic and intrahepatic bile duct neoplasm

Name: obsolete Sezary's disease involving intrapelvic lymph nodes
Definition: A commensal bacterial infectious disease that results in infection
Synonym: Szary's disease of intrapelvic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: liver inflammatory pseudotumor
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the rectum.

Name: obsolete amebic colitis
Definition: An amebiasis that involves infection of the intestine with the protozoan parasite Entamoeba histolytica trophozoites resulting in intermittent nondysenteric diarrhea with abdominal pain

Name: Alagille syndrome
Definition: A liver disease that is characterized by an accumulation of bile in the liver resulting from a reducted number of liver small bile ducts.
